snippet: The Iranian lawyer for Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post reporter incarcerated in Iran for nearly eight months, has requested a five-day release for him starting March 21, the beginning of Iran’s New Year, so he can be with his family.
abstract: Lawyer for Jason Rezaian, Washington Post reporter who has been jailed in Iran without explanation or charges since July 2014, requests five-day release so he can be with his family.
lead_paragraph: The Iranian lawyer for Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post reporter incarcerated in Iran for nearly eight months, has requested a five-day release for him starting March 21, the beginning of Iran’s New Year, so he can be with his family.

headline.main: Iran: New Appeal for Detained Reporter
headline.print_headline: Iran: New Appeal for Detained Reporter
